# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience significantly. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $150. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring how this product can make a difference for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
